titleStmt.title: An answer to a printed paper entituled Articles exhibited in Parliament. Against Mr. John Squier, viccar of Saint Leonard Shoreditch. August 7. 1641.
titleStmt.author: Squire, John, ca. 1588-1653.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: England and Wales, Parliament. Articles exhibited in Parliament, against Master Iohn Squire, Viccar of Saint Leonard Shoreditch, August 7th. 1641 (Wing A3822).
Identified as Wing A3339 on UMI microfilm set "Early English Books, 1641-1700" reel 255.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
